main: ^Higantes or giants made of papier-mache parade the whole town and these giants vary in sizes and are dressed in colorful Higantes Festival costumes so beautifully that they always take the media and tourists’ attention.

c-0: ^It is held every November 23 in the town of Angono in Rizal province known as the “Art Capital of the Philippines.” It is also known as the Feast of San Clemente, the patron saint of fishermen.
^The festival originated over 100 years ago during the Spanish colonial rule.
